## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install test_repo in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure test_repo package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to test_repo
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/farahalfawzy/test-repo):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/farahalfawzy/test-repo.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/farahalfawzy/test-repo)

``` sh
$ conda install -c farahalfawzy test_repo
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/test-repo/)

``` sh
$ pip install test_repo
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/farahalfawzy/test-repo)’s
[pages](https://farahalfawzy.github.io/test-repo/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/farahalfawzy/test-repo) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/test-repo/) respectively.
